title: GoE Framework v2.0 - Geometrodynamics of Entropy: Fermion Mass Quantization and Cosmological Bounce
description: Complete framework for the Geometrodynamics of Entropy (GoE) with arXiv submission package. Includes statistical validation (1M Monte Carlo, 500k permutation tests, 100k bootstrap), corrected paper (2 calibrated parameters, MAPE=7.28%), and reproducible computational protocols. Ready for arXiv submission.
notes: Version 2.0 includes: (1) Complete statistical validation suite with 1M Monte Carlo samples, (2) Critical correction: 2 calibrated parameters (not 4), representing ~90% reduction vs Standard Model, (3) arXiv submission package (1.3 MB) with 14 PDF figures, (4) Numerical consistency verified (MAPE=7.28%, z_b=3.68×10⁴, ∆BIC=13.5), (5) Mathematical derivations corrected (η=0.927), (6) Repository cleaned and production-ready.
